title: Class Traitor 2024! Guns for Babies? 07.15.22
itunes:title: Class Traitor 2024! Guns for Babies? 07.15.22
description:
In episode 1288, Jack and Miles are joined by comic book/TV writer and producer, Cody Ziglar, to discuss… But Who Would Run If Biden Doesn’t? Conservative victimhood train rolls on! Meet the JR-15, an AR-15 For Kids! Starbucks f---ed around with the chicken sandwich wars and FOUND OUT and more!

  1. But Who Would Ru
  2. n If Biden Doesn’t?
  3. Newsom slams red state governors on D.C. trip, stoking speculation about his future
  4. Conservative victimhood train rolls on!
  5. Meet the JR-15, an AR-15 For Kids!
  6. An AR-15 designed for children shocks even the most jaded gun-control advocates
  7. An Illinois gunmaker is under fire for launching a 'JR-15' rifle aimed specifically at kids
  8. Governor Newsom Takes Action to Further Restrict Ghost Guns and Protect California Kids from Gun Violence
  9. Selling a New Generation on Guns
  10. Starbucks fucked around with the chicken sandwich wars and FOUND OUT

LISTEN: Never Give Up by Chronixx
